<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_385</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_385</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Resolución de triángulos oblicuángulos</string>
            <string language="en">Solving oblique triangles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lösen der schiefen Dreiecke</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Solution des triangles obliques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Resolvendo triângulos oblique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Risolvere i triangoli obliqui</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επίλυση των πλάγιων τριγώνων</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones la resolución de triángulos oblicuángulos. Se presentan todos los casos y situaciones posibles que se resuelven utilizando como herramientas el teorema de los senos y el teorema de los cosenos.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to solve oblique triangles.  All the different possibilities are presented and solved using the law of sines and the law of cosines.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">oblicuángulos</string>
            <string language="en">oblique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">teorema del coseno</string>
            <string language="en">law of cosines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">trigonometría</string>
            <string language="en">trigonometry</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">teorema de los senos</string>
            <string language="en">law of sines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">triángulos</string>
            <string language="en">triangles</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, schiefe Dreiecke zu lösen. Alle unterschiedlichen
Möglichkeiten werden mit dem Gesetz von Sinus und dem Gesetz von 
Kosinus dargestellt und gelöst.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations de résoudre les triangles obliques. Toutes les 
différentes possibilités sont présentées et résolues en utilisant
la loi des sinus et la loi des cosinus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações resolver 
triângulos oblique. Todas as possibilidades diferentes são 
apresentadas e resolvidas usando a lei dos senos e a lei dos cosines.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
risolvere i triangoli obliqui. Tutte le possibilità differenti 
sono presentate e risolte usando la legge dei seni e la legge dei 
coseni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να λύσει τα πλάγια τρίγωνα. Όλες οι διαφορετικές 
δυνατότητες παρουσιάζονται και λύνονται χρησιμοποιώντας το νόμο 
των sines και το νόμο των συνημιτόνων.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schief</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gesetz von Kosinus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Trigonometrie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gesetz von Sinus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dreiecke</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">oblique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">loi des cosinus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">trigonométrie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">loi des sinus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">triangles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">oblique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">lei dos cosines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">trigonometry</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">lei dos senos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">triângulos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">obliquo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">legge dei coseni</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">trigonometria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">legge dei seni</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">triangoli</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πλάγιος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">νόμος των συνημιτόνων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">trigonometry</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-el">νόμος των sines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τρίγωνα</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
